name: Labrys
description:
Labrys is a multiplayer (up to 5v1) horror game where one player becomes the minotaur against the human prisoners, trying to escape the randomly generated labyrinth.

Humans can equip perks and find various equipment to aid them escaping the labyrinth.

The minotaur has access to various abilities and augmentations to upgrade his abilities.

Key Features



• Be The Beast
You have the opportunity to play as the mighty minotaur, a fearsome creature with unparalled strength and cunning. Kill the humans as they try to escape the labyrinth, using your superior senses and abilities to hunt them one by one.

Smash through walls and use your abilities to corner your prey. You are the ultimate predator, embrace the power of the minotaur and let the hunt begin!



• The Ultimate Test Of Survival
As a human prisoner, your only goal is to escape the labyrinth before its sealed permanently. Use wits, equipments, agility and the environment to evade the minotaur's wrath. Team with other humans using the voice chat or be selfish to survive. Will you be able to outsmart the minotaur and escape the labyrinth?



• Face The Unknown
In Labrys the labryinth is randomly generated meaning every game is a unique and an unpredictable experience, keeping you on the edge of your seat every time.



• Customize Your Playground
As the session host you have to ability to change many aspects of a session such as, the labyrinth size, room count, exit count, game length, loot amount, objective difficulty for both sides...



• Single player and Co-op mode
Play versus Minotaur AI alone or with your friends!

• Level Progression System and Character Customization
Unlock perks and augmentations and character customization options.
